N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 302.10 - Stopping, standing or parking

State Regulations

Vehicles shall not stop, stand or park except (a) when
necessary to avoid injury or damage to persons or property, (b) while paying
tolls, (c) in obedience to traffic signals or to an order, signal or direction
of any member of the toll force, police department or (d) when unable to
proceed because of the disability of the vehicle; provided, however, that
vehicles may be parked in such places as may be designated by the manager or
his duly authorized representative. Repairs and tire changes shall not be made
except when authorized by a member of the toll force and under his direction. Stopping to pick up or discharge passengers is expressly forbidden except in
designated parking areas. Notes
